course.info: Programme Code: LC518 Course Level: Level 8 Department: Art & Design CAO Points: 2013: 550* Duration: 4 Years Campus: Clonmel *Please note that points are based on a combination of leaving certificate points and up to an additional 600 points allocated to a portfolio assessment/interview. e.g 350 leaving certificate points plus 300 portfolio points will result in a combined result of 650 points.
